cards.description: Describes the conditions, threats, and disturbances affecting a Heritage Resource or Heritage Resource Group. Additional information may include a management recommendation, a condition image, the data the condition was assessed and a description of the condition.
cards.instructions: One assessment of condition at a particular point in time.
cards.name: Condition Assessment
